segments.text: That cookie jar is just sitting there, full of temptation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t blame the kids for wanting a snack, but the way they’re going about it is dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, and that stool is not stable at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why they don’t just ask the woman for a cookie instead of risking a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting, like it’s the most normal thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I don’t think they realize how close they are to getting into trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on drying that plate, she doesn’t even see them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get what they want and get down before the stool tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still pouring, and the floor is getting more slippery by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice the mess before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just waiting for something bad to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
